## Project Overview
DOOM-Tools is a Python-based utility project designed to provide tools and utilities. The project follows standard Python packaging conventions with source code in the `src/` directory and tests in the `tests/` directory.

## Development Guidelines
- Use Python 3.8+ for development
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Include comprehensive docstrings and type hints
- Write unit tests for all functionality
- Maintain this file and README.md as the project evolves
